channel.title: [New Development] HeroStory [New Development]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/iodt0w.png[/img] [b]Background[/b] The game Hero Story is a text-based rpg, very similar to runescape however to make it a text-based I added some features like Attack and Hire a player and the player is worth an 'x' amount and everytime someone hires them they're worth goes up. Being a text-based game, we plan on having this launched in the Android 'Play' Market and the Apple App Store once we get this thing going! You can also view it on the go and you don't have to be on the computer to play! If you would like to join the development please message me. [b]Testing phase - Around June 20th.[/b] Also i'm looking for a graphic designer, while I focus on the Web-based coding. [b]Future[/b] If the text-based version turns out to be a success then I will hopefully get a team together and start making HeroStory into a full 2d Java game with better quests etc. Also both versions of the games will hopefully turn up in your smartphone/tablet marketplace for free. [b]Progress[/b] Green - Finished Red - Not Started
June 3 - [b]20% Item Handling (Only Head and Weapon Slot)[/b] June 3 - [b]5% Admin Control Panel[/b] June 3 - [b]25% Profile Page[/b] June 3 - [b]100% Logout[/b] June 3 - [b]100% Login[/b] June 2 - [b]35% Login[/b] June 2 - [b]100% Player Saving[/b] June 2 - [b]100% Read Full Article's[/b] June 2 - [b]100% Register an account[/b] June 2 - [b]100% Player equipment updates. Accurately wears what you want.[/b] June 2 - [b]100% News Feed[/b] June 2 - [b]100% Latest News[/b] [b]0% Highscores[/b] [b]0% Player Hiring[/b] [b]0% Skills[/b] [b]0% Player Worth[/b] [b]0% Logo[/b] [b]0% Recent Activites[/b] [b]0% Player Ranks[/b] [b]0% Grand Market (Trading)[/b] [b]0% PVM[/b] [b]0% Forums[/b]
[b]Items[/b] - Picture of items right below [code] 1. Whip 2. White Phat 3. Purple Phat 4. Blue Phat 5. Green Phat 6. Yellow Phat 7. Red Phat 8. Rune Full Helm 9. Dragon Longsword 10. Fighter Torso 11. Dragon Platelegs [/code] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2d0m0yh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2mfdufa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/t0km0w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2h54av7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2u61see.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/30nj11l.png[/img]

item.title: [New Development] HeroStory [New Development]
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

It’s a rs2 development… now go search for the other rs2 text based games and move them over here.

No it’s not. Note that this game is a text-based game whilst RuneScape is not. It’s a similar development, but it’s not runescape and therefore belongs here. Moparscape is for the development of Runescape private servers, and this is not a Runescape private server.

Read full topic

item.title: [New Development] HeroStory [New Development]
item.dc:creator: @Hero_Story Hero Story
item.description:
@Hero_Story wrote:

Beta will be released around the 20th - I’ve finished Login/Register/Logout. Also this game is PHP/MySQL/Javascript/AJAX.
side note: I would like a designer whether its for website or otherwise, just PM me if interested.

I will release the beta to the public when I finish a good Hire/Attack system, shoutbox, trading, and item handling (currently added Whip, White Phat, and Purple Phat) more items soon to come!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:

I like it in this section like the other php text games that are posted here. Clearly you can see a party hat and whip.

item.title: [New Development] HeroStory [New Development]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Ok, I don’t think any text-based rpg can get even remotely close to runescape.

I really like your game concept of attack/hire, pretty cool.

Is this in PHP?

Read full topic

item.title: [New Development] HeroStory [New Development]
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

Yeah Acorn’s right, I’m not sure this should be in this section…

Anyways, this is pretty cool, I remember playing iMobster on my iPod, an app that’s based on text where you attack other mobs. It seems kinda lame, but they’re actually pretty fun.

Read full topic

item.title: [New Development] HeroStory [New Development]
item.dc:creator: @Hero_Story Hero Story
item.description:
@Hero_Story wrote:


Background
The game Hero Story is a text-based rpg, very similar to runescape however to make it a text-based I added some features like Attack and Hire a player and the player is worth an ‘x’ amount and everytime someone hires them they’re worth goes up.

Being a text-based game, we plan on having this launched in the Android ‘Play’ Market and the Apple App Store once we get this thing going! You can also view it on the go and you don’t have to be on the computer to play!
If you would like to join the development please message me.
Testing phase - Around June 20th.
Also i’m looking for a graphic designer, while I focus on the Web-based coding.

Future
If the text-based version turns out to be a success then I will hopefully get a team together and start making
HeroStory into a full 2d Java game with better quests etc. Also both versions of the games will hopefully turn up in your
smartphone/tablet marketplace for free.

Progress
Green - Finished
Red - Not Started
